entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
